alert.note: Alert for Northwest Yell County; Southern Johnson County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 1:38PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Logan, south central Johnson, northeastern Scott and northwestern Yell Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 137 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Magazine, or 7 miles east of Booneville, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clarksville... Booneville... Paris... Lamar... Magazine... Knoxville... Subiaco... Scranton... Blue Mountain... Stonehouse Recreation Area... Mt Nebo State Park... Mount Magazine... Midway in Logan County... Spadra... Mosley... Tokalon... Lake Dardanelle... Belleville... Havana... Morrison Bluff... This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 56 and 71. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northwest Yell County; Southern Johnson County
